name: Take-home-exam-3-csis-604
body:
### Part 1 - RPC, RMI, etc (50%)
* Implementing your sorting routine from the previous take home exam using remote procedure calls, remote method invocations, etc. e.g., Java RMI. If you wonder whether your proposed solution fits, e-mail me.
* Must have communication between three or more virtual machines
* Solution must be able to run on your Ubuntu server virtual machine

### Part 2 - Message Queue (50%)
* Implementing your sorting routine from the previous take home exam using message queue libraries in the language of your choice. e.g., ActiveMQ, OpenMQ, etc. If you wonder whether your proposed solution fits, e-mail me.
* Must have communication between three or more virtual machines
* Solution must be able to run on your Ubuntu server virtual machine
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
